title: What I Can Do Now for the Future
detail_text: <:th_ch0207/>There was a special program the other day about the spread of the VR world, did you watch it, Rina-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I saw it too. It’s the one where they said.... that the age where we would be able to enjoy movies and lives in VR might be coming.... right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>That’s right. When watching it, I realized something....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>About what?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>That the day where we might be able to enter the world of anime may not be that far off<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>....You might be right. We can enter the world of games now, after all<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I want to train myself for when that day arrives, so I’ll be able to handle it right away. I’d like the start of my adventure to be filled not with confusion but with excitement and fun!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Then.... I think it’s a good idea if you train on games. There was this VR game.... that I used to play a lot of.... Want to try?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Can I!? I want to try!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Your job is to make sushi. If you don’t respond to the customer’s orders quickly.... they’ll get angry. It’s.... really thrilling.... but it trains your ability to make accurate decisions and act quickly<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Sushi.... I got it! I’ll aim to become a splendid sushi maker!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
